description: Internal representation of a journal posting.

uid.description: Unique ID shared between all postings in the group.

count.description: Number of postings in the group.

type.description: Either 'Deposit', 'Withdrawal', 'Trade', or 'Transfer'. All postings in the group must have the same type.

quantity.description: Change in position for affected contract.

direction.description: Either 'credit' or 'debit'. This is the accounting column of the posting.

note.description: This may be any small string.

timestamp.description: Milliseconds since the epoch when the relevant accounting entry was generated. This probably will not be the same as when it is commited to the database.
